name: Matteland
description:
Note: Pressing "backspace" to erase characters will cause you to return to the previous page when there are previous pages. To avoid this, open the link to this game in a new page without any pages to go back to. A solution to this on windows is pressing Win + R and pasting the link, and then pressing "OK" to open the link.

Matteland (Math Land) is an educational maths game prototype. The game tries to provide math problems/puzzles in an entertaining and engaging format. The game consists of multiple math mini games. The game is aimed at a younger audience to make learning math less of a chore. However, it has not been tested with the target audience and so the level of difficulty may not reflect a proper, final level.

The game is in Norwegian, but the tasks are as follows:

Level 1 (castle):

Answer the multiplication problems to shoot zombies.

Level 2 (volcano):

Answer the addition problems to make the robot jump to a new platform.

Level 3 (house):

For a problem "X bla bla bla Y", where X and Y are numbers, divide the largest amount by the smallest amount to hand out coins.

In some browsers the viewport has been incorrect. If that happens please try downloading the exe file in game.zip.

For a high res experience, download the game as an .exe.
